abstract: Johnson & Johnson and GlaxoSmithKline are teaming up with the venture capital firm Index Ventures on a $199 million fund aimed at the life sciences sector.
snippet: Johnson & Johnson and GlaxoSmithKline are teaming up with the venture capital firm Index Ventures on a $199 million fund aimed at the life sciences sector.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson and GlaxoSmithKline, the pharmaceutical giants, are teaming up with the venture capital firm Index Ventures on a 150 million euro ($199 million) fund targeted at the life sciences sector.

headline.main: Drug Giants Back New Venture Capital Fund
